trans-unit.source: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.
trans-unit.target: Isola in una classe distinta i metodi utilizzati dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> e che possono essere sottoposti a override dagli sviluppatori che estendono il controllo ma sono raramente richiesti dagli sviluppatori di pagine.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> è la classe più grande nell'insieme di controlli Web part.

trans-unit.source: It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: È anche tra le classi più importanti di Web part perché viene utilizzato in ogni pagina Web che contiene i controlli Web part e consente di coordinare e gestione tutti i controlli Web part in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class.
trans-unit.target: Poiché il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe viene utilizzata frequentemente, e poiché contiene molti metodi esposti, alcuni metodi richiesti principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli che estendono il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> contenuti nel controllo il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe.

trans-unit.source: This isolation of less-used methods into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class simplifies the API of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object in IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: L'isolamento dei metodi meno utilizzati nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe semplifica l'API del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe e i metodi isolati non vengono visualizzati nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> oggetto in IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: Developers who use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and customize it extensively.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori che utilizzano il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> è probabile che dispongono di scenari in cui devono ereditare dalla classe di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllare e personalizzare in modo esteso.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> members.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si compila un'applicazione del portale Web o un set completo di controlli Web part con modalità di visualizzazione personalizzate, zone personalizzate, verbi personalizzati, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli e altre estensioni dell'interfaccia di base Web part utente (UI), in molti casi (not Totale) è necessario eseguire l'override ed estendono alcuni del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> membri.

trans-unit.source: And although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class will likely need to call a number of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: E anche se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> è una classe sealed, pertanto non è possibile ereditare da esso personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe sarà probabilmente necessario chiamare un numero del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> metodi per gestire i controlli Web part in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> (classe), la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe fornisce un controllo server che non dispone di alcuna interfaccia utente e non è mai visibile in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe mai viene dichiarata nel markup della pagina, è un oggetto di lavoro che esegue attività in background.

trans-unit.source: The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which references it by means of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> property, and uses the referenced object to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods.
trans-unit.target: Viene dimostrata l'aspetto tipico di utilizzo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> (classe), che fa riferimento a essa mediante il metodo protetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> , proprietà e utilizza l'oggetto di riferimento per chiamare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class contains only methods; there are no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe contiene solo metodi; non sono presenti proprietà o eventi.

trans-unit.source: All the methods in the class involve managing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i metodi nella classe implicano la gestione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli o le connessioni tra i controlli.

trans-unit.source: To handle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for adding them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removing them <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), handling events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), or setting basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Per gestire <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlli, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> include metodi per l'aggiunta (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), rimuoverle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), gestione degli eventi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), ottenere o impostare i dettagli sulla relazione per la zona (ad esempio, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), o l'impostazione di base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> le proprietà del controllo (ad esempio, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).

trans-unit.source: To handle connections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for deleting them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), setting which transformer object to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), and setting a connection error message to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Per gestire le connessioni, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> include metodi per eliminarli (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), impostare l'oggetto trasformatore da utilizzare (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), l'impostazione indica se una connessione condivisa e se è statico (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), e l'impostazione di un messaggio di errore di connessione da utilizzare (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> being added to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> aggiunto all'insieme di controlli del controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o un controllo server all'insieme di controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for closing.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> selezionato per la chiusura.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiama il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> del controllo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited the connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che è entrato o uscito dalla modalità di visualizzazione connessione.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiama il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> del controllo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> selezionato per l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiama il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> del controllo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che è entrato o uscito dalla modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiama il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> del controllo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> selezionato per l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> specificato è stato o meno eliminato.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se la connessione è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> dell'oggetto da creare.

trans-unit.source: Creates an object based on the parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto in base al parametro passato al metodo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the same type as <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> dello stesso tipo di <paramref name="type" />.

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> class to create the type, an alternative that offers better performance than using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo utilizza il <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> classe per creare il tipo, un'alternativa che offre prestazioni migliori rispetto all'utilizzo di <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> selezionato per l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property to indicate that the specified connection object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà per indicare che l'oggetto connessione specificato è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> metodo è un passaggio del processo di chiusura di una connessione esistente tra due <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> o altri controlli server in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> valore della proprietà da `true` per indicare che `connection` viene eliminato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that resides in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che risiede in una zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ID di una zona che contiene il controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o il controllo server specificato.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains <paramref name="webPart" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'ID della zona contenente il parametro <paramref name="webPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> metodo restituisce l'ID dell'area che contiene il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> proprietà di `webPart` fa riferimento all'oggetto effettivo zona contenente `webPart`, non l'ID della zona.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property is `null`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` è chiuso, il valore della relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> proprietà è `null`e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> metodo restituirà l'ID dell'ultimo zona che `webPart` trovava prima della chiusura.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> utilizzato per la connessione tra controlli.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene i dati sullo stato precedentemente salvati.

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Carica i dati sullo stato precedentemente salvati per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che partecipa a una connessione tra controlli.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o un altro controllo server da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o un altro controllo server dall'insieme di controlli del controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes `webPart` from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's collection of Web Parts controls that it maintains for the page.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove `webPart` dall'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> insieme di controlli Web part che gestisce per la pagina del controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> utilizzato per la connessione tra controlli.

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Salva i dati sullo stato per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che partecipa a una connessione tra controlli.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene i dati salvati sullo stato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> metodo salva i dati di configurazione che viene creati quando un utente configura un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> controllo in una pagina Web come parte di una connessione tra i controlli.

trans-unit.source: This configuration data is then reloaded each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control is rendered, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questi dati di configurazione vengono ricaricati ogni volta che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> rendering del controllo, tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that participates in a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che partecipa a una connessione con un altro controllo.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo del messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: Establishes an errors message, and causes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> object that is responsible for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Determina un messaggio di errore e l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> responsabile del rendering di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> esegue il rendering del messaggio anziché quello del contenuto del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> method allows you to associate an error message with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that participates in connections.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> metodo consente di associare un messaggio di errore con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo che partecipa a connessioni.

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se si verifica un errore quando un altro controllo Crea una connessione con il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro dopo il processo di connessione non riuscito, il messaggio di errore viene visualizzato nell'interfaccia utente (UI), anziché il contenuto di `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> oggetto associato `webPart` esegue il rendering di messaggio di errore nella relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o altro controllo server che può disporre di dati condivisi sulla personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>webPart</c> contiene dati condivisi.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o su un altro controllo server che indica se il controllo dispone o meno di dati condivisi sulla personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> metodo indica se `webPart` ha condiviso i dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di `hasSharedData` parametro passato nel metodo viene assegnato al `webPart` del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o un altro controllo server che può disporre di dati sulla personalizzazione utente.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>webPart</c> contiene dati condivisi.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o su un altro controllo server che indica se il controllo dispone o meno di dati sulla personalizzazione utente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> metodo indica se `webPart` sono dati di personalizzazione di singolo utente, a differenza dei dati condivisa.

trans-unit.source: The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo assegna il valore del `hasUserData` parametro per il `webPart` del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> per cui questo metodo imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> is closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> è chiuso o meno in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> proprietà `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non viene effettivamente chiusa `webPart`; imposta solo la proprietà che indica se `webPart` viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> oppure la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> metodo chiama un metodo in una classe base per impostare una proprietà che indica se una particolare istanza di un controllo è condivisa.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part, un controllo condiviso significa che un controllo che è visibile a tutti gli utenti di una pagina.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page.
trans-unit.target: Ciò si differenzia un controllo per ogni utente, che è visibile solo all'utente specifico che ha aggiunto il controllo alla pagina.

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla personalizzazione e condivisi e controlli per ogni utente, vedere [Panoramica sulla personalizzazione delle parti Web](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> per cui questo metodo imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>webPart</c> è condiviso.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> metodo non determina effettivamente il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro da condividere; imposta solo la proprietà che indica se `webPart` è attualmente condivisa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> tra due controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>connection</c> è condiviso.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> metodo non determina effettivamente il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `connection` parametro da condividere; imposta solo la proprietà che indica se `connection` è attualmente condivisa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> per cui questo metodo imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is a standalone control.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>webPart</c> è un controllo autonomo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, it means that the control is not contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando questa proprietà è impostata su `true` su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (controllo), significa che il controllo non è contenuto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zona.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> oppure la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> metodo chiama un metodo in una classe base per impostare una proprietà che indica se una particolare istanza di un controllo è statica.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part, un controllo statico è un controllo che è dichiarato nel markup della pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: Ciò si differenzia un controllo dinamico, che viene aggiunta a una pagina a livello di programmazione, o da un utente da un catalogo di controlli.

trans-unit.source: A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo statico è di per sé un controllo condiviso, vale a dire che è visibile a tutti gli utenti di una pagina e, anche se gli utenti possono chiudere un controllo statico, non possono mai eliminarlo (rimuovere in modo permanente) è.

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla personalizzazione, statici e i controlli dinamici e condivisi e controlli per ogni utente, vedere [Panoramica sulla personalizzazione delle parti Web](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

trans-unit.source: The control for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: Controllo per cui viene impostato il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>webPart</c> è statico.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> metodo utilizzato per impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> valore della proprietà del controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` dichiarata all'interno di una zona nel markup della pagina Web, questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà per `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` viene aggiunto a una pagina a livello di codice oppure da un utente tramite l'interfaccia utente Web part (UI), questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà su `false`.

trans-unit.source: The connection for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: Connessione per cui viene impostato il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se <c>connection</c> è statico.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> metodo utilizzato per impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> valore della proprietà della connessione a cui fa riferimento il `connection` parametro.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` è dichiarato nel markup della pagina Web, questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà per `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` viene aggiunto a una pagina a livello di codice oppure da un utente tramite l'interfaccia utente Web part (UI), questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà su `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that creates a connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> che crea una connessione tra due controlli server.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to be used with <c>connection</c>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> da usare con <c>connection</c>.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object to be used in a connection between two server controls.
trans-unit.target: Assegna un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> da utilizzare in una connessione tra due controlli server.

trans-unit.source: When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method is called to supply a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando una connessione tra due controlli server richiede un trasformatore in modo che il controllo consumer può interpretare i dati dal controllo provider, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> metodo viene chiamato per fornire una specifica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: Se la connessione è già assegnato un trasformatore ad esso, l'oggetto a cui fa riferimento il `transformer` parametro sostituisce quella esistente; in caso contrario, l'oggetto a cui fa riferimento il `transformer` parametro viene utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method whenever you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlli utilizza il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> metodo ogni volta che si chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> metodo per stabilire una connessione che richiede un trasformatore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> whose <c>zoneID</c> property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> di cui viene impostato il valore della proprietà <c>zoneID</c>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the zone that <c>webPart</c> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID della zona a cui appartiene <c>webPart</c>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property that enables a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà che consente a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o a un controllo server di mantenere l'ID della zona che lo contiene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controllare quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo viene aggiunto a una zona.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo tiene traccia dell'ID per l'area a cui appartiene, e questo metodo imposta la proprietà che mantiene il valore ID.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control for which the method sets a zone index.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> per il quale il metodo imposta un indice della zona.

trans-unit.source: The index of <c>webPart</c> within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Indice di <c>webPart</c> all'interno della relativa zona rispetto ad altri controlli presenti nella zona.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'indice del controllo specificato all'interno della relativa zona rispetto agli altri controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> presenti nella zona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> metodo determina il numero ordinale di posizione che `webPart` occupa nella relativa zona, relazione ad altri controlli server nella zona.
